channel.title: The crank thread
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The crank thread" - who has crank questions

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: No. You can be S2 and at Crank 0 and you can still get it. You can try to EDUT it, or you can greass it.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: So if I'm season 4 I need to be at least crank 3 to get Goo Stabilization Recipe? Did that used item team plus white eye and still nothing. What is the best way then to get the GSR?

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: I've been running BurgerNinja missions today at crank 2, and it's been quite helpful … but I'm ALSO in the middle of getting CiCi, so I need to use the various drops anyway. +2 levels and range and +1 strength means few enough failures at Dou 5. It's nice to get 2 AP per mission…

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I got Goo Stabilazation Recipe, and I'm at Crank 0 Due to Monochrome missions being mega annoying. So Crank doesn't affect things… for now. Hopefully *or maybe not* it will later.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: Currently, no. McM HAS suggested that this won't remain the same forever, however, no current content is affected by the crank besides the difficulty of missions.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: SO, wait, does the crank not effect anything at all (besides the obvious difficulty and money/ap boosts)??

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: Comfirm lear, you need to be season 3 and crank does not matter.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: It doesn't.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: Gonna be doing inner wastelands soon, will let yall know if crank 3 in S2 unlocks terri 3.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: As far as I know the crank is not required for Terry 3, just season 3. The only current benefits of the crank is the extra money and exp(since it's based on difficulty) and the extra challenge missions provide. But in the future, new content is supposed to be crank based.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded:
i was the one that asked about billy3.so tnx for the info.
one more:what do i gain from having the crank at 2 insted of 1?i know it means +5% money,but is there anything else,terri 3 maybe(i know you cant get her in S2,but can you get her in S3 with crank less than 3)?
tnxalot

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded:
July 22nd, from the News Archive:

Mission Unlock Change Due to everyone freaking out, the current missions that used to require, say, S2, and now require Crank 1, are BACK to just requiring S2. Everything new, however, will be crank based.

I didn't know about the increase in ally/mission drops with crank. I'd use it more, but I most of the time I'm too lazy to spare stamina to change the crank. Maybe I'll start using it more.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: well if your season 2 the highest your crack goes is 2 so that should make it pretty simple for you

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: It has been said that crank 1+ is required for season 2 stuff.Season 3 stuff, however, cannot be gotten at crank 3 in season 2.Example: You have to be season 3 to be able to level Terry 2 to Retty 3 on the corresponding mission, otherwise you don't get the message.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: I am season 2 and if I want Terri 3, do I have to have it on crank 3 or do I have to be season 3?

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: You can get Billy3 at any crank level.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: I am season 3,while being sp. jonin i changed my crank from 5 to 2,to avoid having to use jutsu and team bonuses for b-rank missions.I became jonin 2 days ago and yesterday i went doing general a-ranks,to get Billy lvl3.After more than 700 stamina(at 8 per misson) and 50 smoke bombs, i didnt get the mission for leveling Billy even once…so today i am hesitant to waste all my stamina,if the mission isnt going to show and since i cant use the crank for free,plus it would make the missions even harder(23/18), i wanted to ask if anybody knows,if its possible that you cant get Billy lvl3 mission at crank 2?and if so,do you need crank 3 or 4?tnxalot

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: Allies that can be leveled in season one do not require a certain crank.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: So in order to level allies such as billy and pinky do I need to be at a certain crank level? Just asking b/c I'm working on leveling them to do my jonin test and I want to make sure I'm not grinding for nothing

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: Special missions in the future will be crank based.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded:
At Season 1, your Max Crank is 0. Each additional Season adds 2 to the Maximum Crank. So, in Season 2, you can have Crank 2. Season 3, you can get Crank 4. And so on.

+1 Max Crank if you have Survived the Impossible.

Are there certain allies that will only level if I'm at that specific crank level or if I'm at say 2 will everything that would happen at 0 and 1 also occur?

Supposedly, at high levels of crank mission drops are improve. My max Crank is 2, so I haven't seen it yet. I don't think they mean item or ally drops, I think they mean events that give bonus friendship/XP/Ryo/Stamina/etc. Nothing should be locked out by cranking higher, though this can be hard to verify if you're not a White Eye.

I'm just wondering because I have gone through this one mission multiple times with ally level theme and other boosts and they still won't go to the next level.

Are you getting the 'Your ally does not level, though she/he may soon' message? If so, then you're doing everything correctly and the RNG is just flipping you off and short of using an autolevel jutsu, they're nothing you can do about it except keep trying.

Also I don't know if this is related but I've got 20 pics of terri and lil' sham but I still can't do the Angel is a Centerfold mission

Special Missions are season based, not crank based. Angel is a Centerfold requires that you be Sp. Jonin or higher, so that may be the problem.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: Are there certain allies that will only level if I'm at that specific crank level or if I'm at say 2 will everything that would happen at 0 and 1 also occur? I'm just wondering because I have gone through this one mission multiple times with ally level theme and other boosts and they still won't go to the next level. Also I don't know if this is related but I've got 20 pics of terri and lil' sham but I still can't do the Angel is a Centerfold mission

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded:
At Season 1, your Max Crank is 0. Each additional Season adds 2 to the Maximum Crank. So, in Season 2, you can have Crank 2. Season 3, you can get Crank 4. And so on.

Each Crank Level adds +1d/+1s to non-Special missions. Crank 1 is +1/+1. Crank 4 would be +4/+4. Et cetera. Also, there is a bonus of +5% Ryo per Crank Level. And, since difficulty of a mission determines the AP/XP Gains of a mission, those increase with every crank.

Crank Levels also affect Item Drops and Ally Levelups. Anything that previously only required S2+ (Like several of the Level 2 allies, like Spot2 and Terri3, or items like the Goo Stabilization Recipe) now also requires you to be at least Crank Level 1. Anything that previously only required S3+ (Like Terri3 or Sandman2) now require you to be at least Crank Level 3.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded:
That's how I understood it, except you also get +1 crank level if you have Survived the Impossible.

I also understood it that you have from 0 through your highest available, but i you're not at a high enough crank level then missions have much lower drop rates and ally's won't level up either, probably other stuff, too. Also in the future new content will require you to at or above a certain crank level.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded:
You are right.

That would mean that standard Crank settings for Seasons and Additional difficulty settings are:

Season 1 - Crank 0 (I don't know of additional difficulty)

Season 2 - Crank 1 (additional difficulty available for season is Crank 2)

Season 3 - Crank 3 (additional difficulty available for season is Crank 4)

Season 4 - Crank 5 (additional difficulty available for season is Crank 6)

Season 5 - Crank 7 (additional difficulty available for season is Crank 8)

Am I right?

And if you are in Season 4 do you have access to Crank levels 0-6 or just levels 4-6?

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded:
THE CRANK - Major Game Change: Instead of difficulty going up after each season, there is now The Crank, which lets you make the game harder or easier. You do this in the Themes menu. Normally, it is once a day for 50 stamina, but this weekend it is free, and can be done as much as you want. Drops that needed S2 now need Difficulty 1, and S3 = Difficulty 3.

Straight from the news archive, since I can't get to BvS from here. Reason is Season 2 unlocks Crank 1 and Crank 2. Unless this was changed?

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded:
I hope this means that S3 stuff still needs Crank 3 to unlock

Crank 2.

Crank 0 = season 1

Crank 1 = season 2

Crank 2 = season 3

etc

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded:
So that people don't take it lightly?

Before, it was also the pre-req for some of the S2 min stuff, though that seems to have been changed for some reason ( people complaining about it for whatever reason they have, I suppose… ). I hope this means that S3 stuff still needs Crank 3 to unlock?

As for why there's no freebie? Because you only get to do it once a day, and it affects quite a lot of stuff when you do change it. Also, the change to mission difficulty means that you get extra XP, I think, someone is checking that out right now, for those of us not in the know.

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded:
all you really get is an additional 10% ryo on regular missions.

why does it cost so much is my question? i mean cmon reaper blood, team, themes, and such you get 1 freebie per day. i had like a day and a half to do it too O_o

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: on the random forum it sayed "one or two days"

item.title: Re: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: By one point, it seems … I just did so on one of my characters. I do wonder why it took 50 stamina, when there was something about this weekend being free for it…

item.title: The crank thread
item.content:encoded: 1 question: when it states "You can turn The Crank either way, but only once per day, and it will cost you 50 Stamina to turn it." does that mean i can chage the crank 1 point, or any number of points once?
